song.title: Surfing on a Sine Wave
song.info: Surfing On A Sine Wave Finished: 23rd February 2010 By Fearofdark This is just me having a little bit of fun with music:D A combination of slap bass and chip (with some stringed things in the background). All samples are 8bit (excluding the finger clicks at the start). Samples ripped from various artists, who I also took inspiration from (Radix, K.Koch, Alexander Brandon, Aceman etc...) 21 chan .xm. made using Modplug Tracker CC Appreciated:) Enjoy!
